lemma ttl_\<tau>Runs2\<tau>Runs_table [simp]: "\<not> is_TNil tls \<Longrightarrow> ttl (\<tau>Runs2\<tau>Runs_table s tls) = \<tau>Runs2\<tau>Runs_table (SOME s''. \<exists>s'. s -\<tau>\<rightarrow>* s' \<and> s' -thd tls\<rightarrow> s'' \<and> \<not> \<tau>move s' (thd tls) s'' \<and> s'' \<Down> ttl tls) (ttl tls)"
